roles.description: I worked on the Data Visualization team, building out new features for the Qualtrics XM Platform. I worked full-stack with a slight emphasis on the front-end, using technologies like React, Typescript, D3, and Golang.

I worked on a team building a gamified application to help call center employees train and onboard. I worked full-stack, building out the front-end (Javascript & React) and the back-end (Java & Springboot) of the application.

I have worked on a variety of projects, building websites and small web applications for clients. I gained experience with a number of technologies, including HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Node.js, PHP, and MongoDB. I also learned a lot about working with clients and managing projects.
